title: Pause L3 Show
desc: Name of Trio show to use

title: Pause L3 Template
desc: Name/Number of template to use to create graphic

title: Pause L3 Channel
desc: Which Engine will this graphic go to?

title: Pause L3 Page Number
desc: Page Number.  If this number is used, will send to next available number

title: Send to Slack Automatically
desc: If On, will automatically send to Slack at first opportunity

title: Send to Trio Automatically
desc: If On, will automatically send to Trio at first opportunity

title: Slack Channels
desc: Post Images to these Slack Channels.  Separate with commas (i.e. channel-one, channel-two)
